content: * decrease = single_crochet 2 together over the span of 2 stitches also known as a decrease * half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet * double_crochet = double_crochet * popcorn = small popcorn∗ please note that this pattern is written so that each crochet stitch abbreviation is attached to a number such as 1sc 2sc etc this number denotes how many of that stitch is to be worked into the same stitch in other words 1sc = one single_crochet whereas 2sc = two single_crochet worked into one stitch also known as an increase ∗be sure to read through the special instructions for the popcorn before beginning as it is unique for this crochet corn pattern **follow us for more crochet content and amigurumi adventures ** https //virkadia com/ | blog https //virkadia etsy com | etsy https //www instagram com/virkadia | instagram https //www pinterest com/virkadia | pinterest https //www facebook com/virkadia | facebook https //www tiktok com/@virkadia | tiktok **thank you for all of your support **
